m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- As LG Elec profit skids, home appliance lift cushions smartphone losses An employee stands in front of LG Electronics' television sets, which are made with LG Display flat screens, at its store in Seoul, South Korea, July 23, 2015. Reuters/Kim Hong-Ji SEOUL South Korea's LG Electronics Inc (066570.KS) reported a 37 percent slide in quarterly profit as its mobile device business lost money, but still beat market expectations on strong home appliances earnings and sales of high-end televisions.
